attributes.action: Do not allow a second referendum,britian has chose to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The country is divided and no matter what happens half the country will have lost,britains independence day is a big deal and should not be jeopardised by a few sore losers,churchill and other great british men would be proud.
attributes.background: Many remain voters are trying to get you the government to allow a second referendum,what's done is done,I and many others strongly believe leaving was the best future for our country and urge you to not allow this,if it happens it will go round and round,the decision is made and should be stuck to.
